website_summaries.verdict: A cult-classic lip balm that you'll want to have on hand all the time.
pros: Multipurpose lip balm calms dried, sunburned lips instantly, but can be applied to wounds and burns on other parts of the body as well
Provides long-lasting hydration, so you won't need to reapply frequently
cons: Tin packaging dents easily and can be difficult to open

customer_reviews.title: This is a comfort
customer_reviews.text: This is a favorite of mine. I’ve been using it for at least 15 years. I like the minted Rose for myself and the plain one for my grandson. A three year old that gets chapped lips and chapped under the nose when he has a cold. He’s a special needs child who is nonverbal but he brings me the balm and points to his lips and nose when he is uncomfortable. Thanks so much to Smith’s for a life changing product.
customer_reviews.author: Christmas junkie

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful Lip Balm for Women and Men
customer_reviews.text: I first received a tin of the Rosebud Lip Balm in my Christmas stocking and immediately fell in love with it. It's not too greasy, doesn't have any scent that I can detect, and although it is a rose color it doesn't actually add color to your lips so the men in my house use it also. I never have chapped or dry lips! I keep one next to my bed and one in the bathroom. I really love it and will continue to order it.
customer_reviews.author: wen313

customer_reviews.title: Just a hint of color for my fair skin
customer_reviews.text: Despite the fact that I didn't know "minted" actually meant mint flavored, I love this. I normally don't like flavored lip items but the mint is different than typical. The application is very smooth and not sticky at all. I don't wear much makeup and have very fair skin. This gives me just a little color. It's beautiful. I tried the rosy Vaseline...it smells and tastes like perfume and is thick and sticky with application.
customer_reviews.author: Jill

customer_reviews.title: Not very moisturizing
customer_reviews.text: I love the smell of this, and it has that cooling mint sensation that I love, but it doesn't actually moisturize my lips. It creates a nice shine, temporarily, and it's not as shiny as a gloss, but it just sits on my lips for maybe half an hour and then I feel like I need to reapply. Or more accurately, reapply a different lip balm that I know works. The pink tint doesn't really show up on my lips, but some other reviews here say that it does lightly show on other people.
customer_reviews.author: LVS

customer_reviews.title: Yasss
customer_reviews.text: The best lip balm! I've been using this stuff for years and a little goes a very long way. It smells amazing and makes my lips super soft. It's very hydrating, I go replace it every couple months and use it religiously a few times a day. I even apply this before I wear a matte lipstick and by the time I apply all my makeup it has had time to set so I can apply my lipstick. Overall the hydration of my lips lasts very long and no more dead skin!
customer_reviews.author: Tbg2006

customer_reviews.title: Favorite Lip Balm!
customer_reviews.text: This lip balm is fantastic. It has a smooth texture and isn't overly thick, a great minty scent, and the perfect amount of tint and shine. It goes on very well, and lasts a long time on the lips. The tin is also a good size, and should last a while even with daily use. The product keeps my lips soft and is the best I've found yet. It adds a bit of shine and color, and I would recommend this product to anyone seeking a hydrating and comfortable lip balm.
customer_reviews.author: Tea

customer_reviews.title: Don’t buy in hot seasons. Shipping and delivery ruin the product.
customer_reviews.text: The shipping/handling/delivery of this product is the issue. The product does not do well in hot temperatures. I live in Las Vegas, NV and one can only imagine what happened to the balm when the package was left under the sun in the middle of June. The balm melted causing a vacuum-like suction to the lid so it’s impossible to open and it was seeping out of the tin can even with the seal. Once it’s open, it’s not as minty unlike if it wasn’t melted. Probably best to buy in the colder months.
customer_reviews.author: MM

customer_reviews.title: Dries out lips
customer_reviews.text: The container was very difficult to get open. I tried this out for a week and realized that it caused me to have dry and severely chapped lips. Took a week break and my lips were back to normal. I decided to give it another chance since I know that it's pretty cold out right now, but after one day of using it again my lips became painfully chapped and dry. The moisturizing qualities only remain for a few minutes before I feel like my lips are extremely dry. I also broke out around my lips after the first week of use. I really wanted to like this product, but now I'm back to just regular chapstick.
customer_reviews.author: Maria Cortorreal

customer_reviews.title: Very nice, but don't expect magic
customer_reviews.text: This is good lip balm. The mint smell is very nice. The tint isn't much, but it's not expect to be the same as lip stain or gloss. It works well and feels nice, but doesn't stay on very long. That being said, you get a lot for what you pay, so a container still lasts a LONG time. The little tin is adorable, and not at all difficult to open if you give it a little twist while pulling up (like on all little tin containers).
customer_reviews.author: Oveta

customer_reviews.title: Love it.
customer_reviews.text: I'm a die hard fan of the rosebud salve so I had to give this one a try as well. I love using this on my lips after brushing my teeth before bed at night. My husband loves this stuff, too. I also use it on my cuticles. I definitely recommend!
customer_reviews.author: LL

customer_reviews.title: Great balm, horrible container.
customer_reviews.text: I love this product but the container is slowly driving me insane. Trying to open it if balm has gotten on the sides is nearly impossible and makes me want to throw it out the window. Luckily I have saved my sanity by transferring it into a different container. I suggest you do the same.
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie E

customer_reviews.title: Great soothing balm with little shine.
customer_reviews.text: This lip balm is really good. It has a smooth texture and isn't overly thick and the perfect amount of tint and shine. It goes on very well, and lasts a long time on the lips. The tin is also a good size, and should last a while even with daily use. The product keeps my lips soft and is the best I've found yet. It adds a bit of shine and color, and I would recommend this product to anyone seeking a hydrating and comfortable lip balm.
customer_reviews.author: May

customer_reviews.title: This is a great remedy for chapped lips
customer_reviews.text: This is a great remedy for chapped lips! And I know that a lot of other people said they couldn't get the top off, but I haven't had that problem at all. The lid is actually pretty loose and one time I was able to open it with just one hand a little bit of shaking. So don't let that deter you from buying it! My only complaint is that you have to constantly re-apply it. It's very shiny and slick so it doesn't have much staying power. But otherwise it's a great product.
customer_reviews.author: Danielle J.

customer_reviews.title: Quality item
customer_reviews.text: First time use and purchase of this line. Smells great and really does the trick of moisturizing. I have 2 teens who love it and are super picky. No brainer id they like it ; they’ll use it. Excellent purchase and would highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: sal

customer_reviews.title: So soothing!
customer_reviews.text: This is the best product ever! I was getting horribly chapped lips at work due to a dry environment and talking on the phone pretty much all day. I bought this and after one day my lips were soooo soft. Then yesterday a nasty cold hit me and I was wiping my nose constantly. Today my nose was chapped and sore and on a whim I decided to put some of this on my nose. Wow!! Not only was it soothing, the mint helped to open up my nasal passages. I love this stuff so much. The scent is lovely and not too heavy and a little goes a long way so this tin will last a long time.
customer_reviews.author: Kittycd78

customer_reviews.title: Least fave flavor but still decent
customer_reviews.text: Love this brand and have tried almost all flavors/scents. This one is my least favorite because it smells like Vick's vapor rub. With all their other flavors of lip balm you can still get a hint of rose but this is very Vick's vapor rub. Still used this, though. Probably just my fault for not thoroughly reading product description before purchasing.
customer_reviews.author: S.

customer_reviews.title: bad packaging
customer_reviews.text: While the product was fine, the tin container wasn't. It was very difficult to get off. I ended up throwing it all away because I couldn't get it open.
customer_reviews.author: Beth S.

customer_reviews.title: Summer order didn’t work
customer_reviews.text: I live in Las Vegas. Triple digits. This was left in my mailbox. It’s complete liquid and leaked in package. It’s in my fridge. I ordered it because I assumed it would be out in with other packages delivered to my door. Now , although I love this product , I can’t order it in Summer ! Bummer
customer_reviews.author: Jessica Marciel

customer_reviews.title: Scent is everything!
customer_reviews.text: Amazing. I’ve always loved Smith’s and always saw and bought the original flavor so was thrilled when I saw this one. The flavor and smell is soooo good!! Even cleared up my airways when I put it on my lips when I had a cold. Will big again when I need more!
customer_reviews.author: Penn

customer_reviews.title: Love the product / hate the container
customer_reviews.text: Love love love this lip balm. It's one of my favorites, but I absolutely have a horrible time trying to open it. I end up putting it in a separate container that is much easier to twist open.
customer_reviews.author: Chris

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: I pretty much tried all the scent Rosebud Perfume Company. I love all the of them. I use this one mainly on Winter bc I like the smell of Mint. Stays on pretty good and not so strong. Also, buy the 3 packs for gifts.
customer_reviews.author: KH

customer_reviews.title: Pretty Decent
customer_reviews.text: I love how my lips feel when the product is on. It has a mint tingle, which I LOVE and I like the smell, but right after it wears off, my lips feel dry and gross. I've used it for a while now, and I think it's just drying out my lips. Also I have a very difficult time getting the tin open. I would not recommend this packaging, though it is cute, to someone who has arthritis or someone who just has a hard time opening things.
customer_reviews.author: Carly

customer_reviews.title: Good product fo accutane's dryness.
customer_reviews.text: I have been on Accutane for 6 months now and I have purchased many lip balms trying to find some sort of relief for my extremely dry lips. This product is quite amazing. It's very creamy and it provides a good layer of protection. I have to apply every 10 minutes or so, but that's the norm for me with any other lip balm. The scent is okay - not a big fan of it, but it doesn't bother me thou. Overall a good product - I recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Vic R.

customer_reviews.title: Good for allergies to lip balm.
customer_reviews.text: This is so great because I'm allergic to most lipbalms. So I've been looking for one that wouldn't cause my lips to swell and start cracking at the corners. I've tried many (its particularly bad with eos) so it was great finding one that finally didn't make my lips worse.
customer_reviews.author: Fatima Fortu

customer_reviews.title: I love this product and the way it applies
customer_reviews.text: This is my second time getting this.It glides on smooth and doesn't give a waxy feeling. I usually apply this at night before going to bed or when I'm home. downside would be the packaging.its a pot so you need to stick your finger to get the product. You should make sure you have clean fingers every time you want to apply. product itself is awesome!! I used it couple of years back and loved it but wanted to try other products and after using so many different ones i came back to this...
customer_reviews.author: Aneela

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: I have tried many lip balms. All seem to have the same effect as the other one, which is a slight moisturizing effect while the lip balm remains on the lips but the effects fade. This one has almost a cooling effect when you first put it on. I don't smell an extreme rose smell or an extreme mint smell. It smells almost like a medicated mint lip balm. I would recommend this lip balm. I myself love it and you get a good amount of this lip balm in this tin. Will absolutely repurchase this item.
customer_reviews.author: Jen

customer_reviews.title: Favorite lip balm ever!!!!
customer_reviews.text: Love this stuff! It’s tingles but smells great and feels great. Adds a bit of shine and color but nothing crazy. Lips feel hydrated and plump after just a few minutes.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin

customer_reviews.title: YASSSS!! I love this thing

customer_reviews.author: Emma Garcia

customer_reviews.title: Definitely a rosebud for your lips!
customer_reviews.text: I love this lip gloss! It heaks my chapped lips and protects them. The subtle taste of mint at the end is so refreshing! Always want this in my pocket!

customer_reviews.title: Very difficult to open, but a great product for lips once it is open.

I guess I'll throw it away and consider this a lesson learned. I have no idea whether it works or not. Update. I was finally able to open with a wrench. Nothing should be this difficult to open. It's nice once you get to it. Please make it easier to open!!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Agent Provocateur

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: Got it a day after delievering even though I have prime and two day free shipping I was willing to wait so great on delivery. It looked so nice and the scent wasn't heavy. Feels great on my lips and after 30 min., no need to reapply as of right now.
customer_reviews.author: Laura Nguyen

customer_reviews.title: Packing sucks. Doesn’t open.

Twisting it would just make it tighter and not open. It took me about ten minutes to open it by using a knife to pop the lid open. Love this product and a good price but something is wrong with the packing
customer_reviews.author: kerry banh

customer_reviews.title: Way too goopy
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for a lip gloss that was not in a plastic container that had berry tint to it that would moiturize my lips. This balm is very sticky, so each time I put it on my lips I need to really wash my hands or my finger will be sticky all day. There really isn't a tint to it either. Just not a fan. It seems like something I would get as a young girl.
customer_reviews.author: David R.

customer_reviews.title: Moisturizing
customer_reviews.text: I love rosebud salve but have a hard time finding it in stores. This was not a disappointment when I got it for sure! It had a great smell and makes my lips feel amazing!
customer_reviews.author: kind of fun but hard

customer_reviews.title: Nice

This says lips, but I use it like my rosebud salve, on hands, scrapes, chapped cheeks, even the occasional diaper rash. The mint is very minimal and not at all overwhelming.
customer_reviews.author: Lindsey Jane

customer_reviews.title: The best
customer_reviews.text: Beyond being an amazing balm, it's a true little treat and delight to wear. The smell is so good!
customer_reviews.author: H

customer_reviews.title: Miracle product
customer_reviews.text: This balm takes care of scars, helps heal cuts, and makes my lips look and feel so nice that I can't remember what I did before I started using it. And it lasts SO long!!!
customer_reviews.author: Ziporakat

customer_reviews.title: Come up with a solution please !
customer_reviews.text: I have two sides of reviews positive and negative. Negative : it arrived everything melt and turn upside down not cool and the textures kinda fake. Positive : I like the smoothness and the case vintage that’s it.
customer_reviews.author: MaryJane Aleskerov

customer_reviews.title: Amazing Product
customer_reviews.text: I use this every morning. I don't wear lipstick because I like natural colored lips. It is the best for dried/chapped lips. In my opinion there is nothing better on the market.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love it, bought it 6 times so far
customer_reviews.text: Only beauty product I have bought more than once (6 times), and have used every little drop of. Hydrates lips so well in all weathers and the rose-minty smell is lovely.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Won't ever stop using Smith's Lip Balm
customer_reviews.text: I use this lip balm religiously. It's the only product that keeps my lips healthy. If I don't put it on every night before I go to bed I wake up with chapped lips. I'll never use any other lip balm. Been using Smith's for years and can't see myself using anything else.
customer_reviews.author: Veronica E Silber

customer_reviews.title: The tin can be difficult to open
customer_reviews.text: Rosebud Lip Balm, Minted Rose was very moisturizing. I was hoping for a little more color. On the lips it did not show.. just shine. My biggest disappointment is the tin is very difficult to open most of the time.
customer_reviews.author: Kim Fackelman

customer_reviews.title: Great for chapped lips!
customer_reviews.text: I love this stuff! It keeps my lips soft and adds a nice glossy look. I pick at my lips all the time so I needed to find something that would reverse the damage I have done. I apply this at night and it has really helped my chapped lips throughout the winter. The smell is light so I hardly notice it and it is a pretty light pink color.
customer_reviews.author: Shivani

customer_reviews.title: Silky feel, Beautiful Rose Tint. Metal Container hard to open.
customer_reviews.text: Love the silky feel of this and the nice rose tint. I wear this or cherry Chapstick everyday! Container a little difficult to open for me. If you are elderly or problems with your finger/strength you may have some difficulty opening.
customer_reviews.author: Jenniffer and Chuck Lewis

customer_reviews.title: Came a melted mess & nearly impossible to open
customer_reviews.text: The actual lip balm is nice... If you can manage to open the thing. I've ruined my nails each time i've tried to open it. Also, when it arrived, all of the lip balm was smashed into one side of the jar, like it got too hot laying on its side and I had to smooth it out and it just got everywhere. I wish this was easier to open and that it arrived as it looked in the picture. I really like the product but the packaging and presentation was just awful. Sad about this purchase as it was not an inexpensive lip product.
customer_reviews.author: Shannon T. Collins

customer_reviews.title: Good but dont open it until it is cooled if you buy in summer
customer_reviews.text: It is good. Do not open it until it is cooled. It was left by the porch and melted completely. Best to wait.

customer_reviews.title: Product is great if you can actually get to it. Get the tube instead

customer_reviews.author: alyssa

customer_reviews.author: Bixby Q

customer_reviews.author: Herb Padigimus

customer_reviews.author: Karen Beth Martin

customer_reviews.title: Never leaves my side
customer_reviews.text: I've been using this for years! Excited it's available on Amazon, and as a subscribe & save item... No more trips to Sephora just for this!
customer_reviews.author: Shelby B

customer_reviews.title: Great stuff
customer_reviews.text: My lips get chapped pretty easily. I used to use Nivea Medicated for years and it worked pretty well but winters in NYC make my lips feel like sandpaper. I received my first jar from a co-worker and it worked like a charm this past winter. I apply 2-3 times a day and it keeps my lips hydrated for hours without a greasy feel. This has a mint feel to it but its not overpowering.
customer_reviews.author: Jason

customer_reviews.title: I have super sensitive skin so everything tends to bother me
customer_reviews.text: I have super sensitive skin so everything tends to bother me, but this doesn't. It's got a vaseline-like texture and the tint is very mild so it doesn't look unnatural, and it's nice and glossy and smooth. I usually put on a base coat and wait about ten minutes before applying another coat because the first layer will absorb into my lips and then I have the top one that lasts longer. A little bit goes a long way, too, so it's gonna last quite a while. Definitely would recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Works great
customer_reviews.text: I find this stuff works way better than chapstick for chapped lips. Usually chapstick takes a few days for my lips to improve with multiple applications, this stuff seems to heal even badly chapped lips overnight when I use it just once. Pretty mild scent.
customer_reviews.author: Bill

customer_reviews.title: Not very minty.

customer_reviews.text: I bought this product after one of my close friends recommended it. I ordered it during the summer time, and to my dismay, the product had softened after being left outside in a package and was very slick and oily. I used a popsicle stick and smoothed the top as best as i could, and put it in the fridge until it hardened. Thankfully, it hardened, and the product came out fine. The balm is very minty and slightly scented, and is great for chapped lips. I normally don't like to wear anything on my lips, but this is one of the few products I will wear on my lips. Great product!

customer_reviews.title: I love this stuff

customer_reviews.author: Megan
